column14: description
A light, latin american cerveza type beer with a modern twist. This is a crisp, clean lager made with Mexican limes and world-renowned salt sourced from El Valle Salado.
Cider and cinnamon infused cane sugar will remind everyone of country style apple pie.

An authentic, refreshing, easy-drinking Czech amber lager. Light spicy and herbal Czech Saaz hop notes is upfront. Rich toasty, bready malt from Czech floor-malted pilsner malt with a slight hint of caramelized sugar. Firm bitterness leads to clean crisp refreshing finish.
A vibrant and refreshing wheat ale with tropical fruits character. Flavour of tangerine and mango balanced by grainy wheat. Light-bodied. Light haze. Easy drinking.
A strong pale lager that balances between rich flavour and lager drinkability. Robust grainy pilsner malt flavour with light doughy notes. Herbal hop aroma with light citrus and white grape.

An easy-drinking West Coast IPA. Aroma and flavour of passionfruit, blueberry, gooseberry, and grapefruit. Firm pleasant bitterness. Grainy malt with a slight hint of toffee and sweetness. Light body and clean dry finish.

A light, clean lager with a hint of malt and subtle hop flavour. An iconic East Van beer. Clean, crisp and refreshing. A pale lager brewed with all malted barley and local Sterling hops grown at Sartori Cedar Ranch in Chilliwack, BC. Fermented cool using a traditional German lager yeast.

A “light” version of P49’s Craft Lager…Clean, light-bodied, very refreshing and thirst-quenching pale lager. Low on both malt and hop flavour but not as flavourless as the "light" beers from macro breweries
Inspired by the traditional Czech Pilsner style,this beer is crisp and refreshing with a rich and complex bready maltiness complimented by the slightly spicy and floral hop character.

A cream ale, a beer that has the refreshing crispness of a lager and the satisfying subtle complexity of an ale. A gentle, soft grainy malt sweetness, a touch of corn, complemented with a delicate floral hop note. Crystal clear with straw colour.

A west coast IPA with a ton of hop flavour and aroma.
 Subtle sweet malt flavour backs up the huge amount of orange,
 grapefruit, pine and floral aromas this beer expels.
An easy-drinking sour ale. The refreshing aroma of lime and ginger along with the light tingling ginger spiciness. Moderately high clean sourness. Tastes like ginger limeade.

A best bitter (English pale ale) brewed to showcase our favorite English malt, Golden Promise from Thomas Fawcett & Sons. Crackery and grainy, light yet rich flavourful malt from the Golden Promise. Delicate candy-like mouthfeel from invert sugar from UK.  Firm bitterness. A hint of apricot and dark dried fruits from an ale yeast strain from West Yorkshire.

A characterful yet easy-drinking rustic table saison. Fragrant fruity aroma of apricot, pear, bergamot, and light peppery spice notes from an authentic Belgian yeast. Very high carbonation makes it light and refreshing.
A gluten-free lager brewed without using gluten-containing ingredients. Delicate herbal and spicy German Perle hop character.
A dry Caribbean style stout with rich coffee and chocolate notes. Beautiful cascade and smooth velvety mouthfeel from the nitro.
Rich malt flavours of caramel, toffee and light chocolate. This ale is an ode to the pub beers of England. Well balanced flavours of malts and hops make this beer a classic.
Crisp grainy malt with light peach flavour and slight tartness. Dry and high in carbonation. Very refreshing.
Vibrant and empowering Tropical Hibiscus POG(passionfruit, orange, guava).

Hoppy, sessionable juicy IPA. Hop aroma of pineappple, mango, peach, pear, and lime from Mosaic, Amarillo and Citra Cryo dryhop. Light crisp grainy malt flavour. Light ceamy mouthfeel from oats and wheat. Quite hazy but not too thick. Great combination of juicy, hoppy, and sessionable.

This heavily dryhopped hazy IPA showcases a new hop variety from New Zealand, Superdelic. We combined it with a yeast strain that enhances fruity thiol production with mash-hopping. High in passionfruit, mango, lime, gooseberry, sweet candy, and berry aroma.

A dry, easy-drinking red IPA. Hop characters of lime, pine, kiwi, gooseberry, and spice. Kight grainy malt with a hint of bread, raisin, and roast complexity. Moderate bitterness with dry finish with evergreen aftertaste.
Trash Panda uses huge amounts of dry hopping, giving this beer complex notes of melon, tropical fruit and pear. Its hop and malt varieties leave a visible haziness and smooth, juicy mouth feel.
A classic German summer thirst-quenching mix of Bavarian lager and fresh grapefruit juice.
An easy-drinking Irish Red Ale with a nuanced malt profile. A delightful grainy sweetness, toasted bread, and delicate toffee notes from the malts.
The 90’s called: they want their IPA back. With HUGE notes of dank pine, citrus & candied fruit, followed by an assertively BIG AND BOLD IPA bitterness, as it should be.

This amber ale combines the best ingredients that Europe and North America have to offer. Belgian crystal malts provide notes of dark fruit and raisins and Cascade hops provide a slight bitterness and a hint of fresh pine.
Hazy, pillowy soft body of Pilsner malt, wheat and oats, wrapped in heavy late and dry-hop additions of Mosaic & Amarillo
St Augustines Hazy IPA
Bavarian-style craft lager by Parallel 49.

A true balance of malt and hops that showcase the bready,caramel flavours of malted barley and the citrus, stone-fruit aromas of hops grown in the Pacific Northwest. Refreshingly drinkable and full of flavour.

This robust red ale has beautiful citrus and pine notes that come from generous additions of Centennial, Citra & Simcoe hops. It is smooth & velvety in the mouth with toasted malts providing a medium body with hints of roasted hazelnut, toffee & caramel malt flavours.
This beer pours a cascading jet black with a signature tan  head. Aromas of coffee and dark chocolate give way to a  perfectly smooth and creamy mouthfeel
Inspired by trips to the 5 cent candy aisle, Gummy Sour is an explosion of flavour. Perfectly sweet with a pleasant acidity, these fruit sours are designed to satisfy our candy cravings.

This is the kind of IPA we dream about. Unfiltered so nothing of the greatness gets lost. It is soft, with lots of tropical fruit notes and a touch of herbal quality. Incredibly drinkable and super delicious.

Paying homage to traditional German pilsners with their sublime balance between hop and malt. Old and new hop varieties make this appealing to both traditionalists and more adventurous pilsner lovers.
Semi-sweet cider with blackberry. Medium tartness and moderate sweetness. A hint of violet, cinnamon, honey, rose and earthiness.
